content: for sewing stuff 5 sitting body and head r1 magic_ring 8sc 8 r2 increase x8 16 r3 single_crochet increase x8 24 r4 3sc increase x6 30 r5 4sc increase x6 36 r6-9 single_crochet around 4 rounds 36 r10 4sc decrease x6 30 r11-12 single_crochet around 2 rounds 30 r13 3sc decrease x6 24 begin stuffing r14-15 single_crochet around 2 rounds 24 r16 single_crochet decrease x8 16 we will be crocheting on the arms in the next rounds instructions underlined are when to crochet through the arm and body r17 4sc 4sc 4sc 4sc 16 r18 single_crochet around 16 r19 increase x16 32 stuff the neck r20 2sc increase x10 2sc 42 r21-27 single_crochet around 7 rounds 42 r28 5sc decrease x6 36 r29 4sc decrease x6 30 r30 3sc decrease x6 24 begin stuffing the head r31 2sc decrease x6 18 r32 single_crochet decrease x6 12 r33 decrease x6 6 finish stuffing fo leave a tail for sewing 6 legs standing x2 r1 magic_ring 6sc 6 r2 increase x6 12 r3 single_crochet increase x6 18 r4 4sc 3scinc 2sc 3scinc 2sc 3scinc 7sc 24 r5 single_crochet around 24 r6 6sc decrease x6 6sc 18 r7 3sc decrease x6 3sc 12 r8-9 single_crochet around 2 rounds 12 fo the first leg mark the 10th stitch of the last round make a second leg crochet an extra 4sc after round 9 do not fo connecting legs/ standing body/ head 7 with your yarn still attached to your second leg take the first leg and place a single_crochet into that 10th stitch with the stitch marker in it this will count as the first single_crochet of r1 r1 single_crochet around 12 in the first leg and 12 in the second 24 if there are gaps between the legs attach a piece of yarn and tie a knot to close them r2 3sc increase x6 30 r3 4sc increase x6 36 r4-7 single_crochet around 4 rounds 36 r8 4sc decrease x6 30 r9-10 single_crochet around 2 rounds 30 r11 3sc decrease x6 24 begin stuffing r12-13 single_crochet around 2 rounds 24 r14 single_crochet decrease x8 16 we will be crocheting on the arms in the next rounds instructions underlined are when to crochet through the arm and body r15 4sc 4sc 4sc 4sc 16 r16 single_crochet around 16 r17 increase x16 32 stuff the neck r18 2sc increase x10 2sc 42 r19-25 single_crochet around 7 rounds 42 r26 5sc decrease x6 36 r27 4sc decrease x6 30 r28 3sc decrease x6 24 begin stuffing the head r29 2sc decrease x6 18 r30 single_crochet decrease x6 12 r31 decrease x6 6 fo cut yarn leaving a few inches use a yarn needle to thread through the back loops of the remaining 6 stitches pull tight to close weave in the end 8 hair attach yellow to the top of the head ch9 8sc down the chain slip_stitch in the next stitch to the left ch9 8sc down the chain slt in the next stitch to
